definition: To enhance or make something better, typically used to describe the act of improving a situation, condition, or quality. It is commonly employed when discussing the process of refining or upgrading something to achieve a higher standard or level of performance.

examples.english: I want to improve my German skills.
You should improve your work habits.
We need to correct our mistakes.

examples.german: Sie versucht, ihr Selbstvertrauen zu verbessern.
examples.english: She is trying to boost her self-confidence.

examples.german: Er hat seine Fitness durch regelmäßiges Training verbessert.
examples.english: He improved his fitness through regular exercise.
